reviews.review: me caguei todo, melhor q activia

Despite the many bugs it has, Its a really fun game. And cheap too so there's another reason to get it. Plus you can refund it if its "not your style". So just try it, you really got nothing to lose..... except for your time if you get hooked.

Great game, I would recommend it to people who like horror survival multiplayer games were they can pick which side. And you can invite your friends and chase them around like a madman or woman if your a girl.
Edit: So, I've been playing DBD for awhile now, not enough to have mastered nurse sadly, so I've decided to revise this review a bit. So DBD is now 4 years old with a plethora of DLC available, with none being necessary for playing. Oh this person has this DLC? Don't worry you can still play with them with no issues. Yes, there are some bugs, but they aren't nearly as frequent as Fallout 76's bugs, you'd have to go actively looking for bugs to get them. The community can be a little toxic... Okay make a little to a lot of. But it's not everyone whose like this, only the people who consider this an Olympic sport rather than a game for enjoyment will be this level of toxic. My advice for dealing with these people is just be polite, say GG WP and leave the End Game Result Screen. Back to the game itself! The game is the same concept no matter what, but, it still has replay potential, as every game your thrown into is different. No two things are the same in each match, the hatch might spawn in the corner rather than in the center. You might go against a Freddy rather than a Trapper. There might not be a pallet between those rocks, but there's a pallet between two cars instead. Plus, everyone has their own play style, some prefer an aggressive play style, some prefer a stay out of sight and you'll be fine play style, and some might be a mix between the two. Now onto the different killers and survivors. The survivors don't have anything special on each character, once you get all the teachables unlocked, all survivors are basically the same. Killers are unique, in the fact that each one has their own unique power.... Okay Leatherface is basically a worse Hillbilly that you should only get for BBQ & Chili. Other than that ever ot- Okay Ghostface and Micheal Myers are basically the same concept, but Ghostface does it better imo. But other than those four, all killers are unique in both concept and in practice. 
TL;DR is buy the game and make the Nea- I mean the Entity proud!
Gioco molto bello, ma l'attesa per entrare in partita √® infinita cercate di accorciare i tempi

Pot sa spun despre Dead by Daylight ca este in opinia mea unul dintre cele mai distractive jocuri. Actiunea, grafica si alte aspecte ale jocului m-au lasat surprins. Merita sa dai fiecare ban pe el. Singurul lucru care este urat la acest joc sunt hackeri de pe acesta si ca esti nevoit sa cumperi DLC-urile ca sa poti avea si ceilalti supravietuitori si ucigasi, eu cred ca mai tarziu acest joc va deveni 'Pay for Win'.

Gameplay: 9/10 - Deoarece sunt cateva buguri care il opresc pe Killer sa te prinda si gasesti hackeri.
Grafica : 10/10

Permettetemi di far partire questa recensione con: "era meglio quando era peggio" (capirete il perch√© nel corso della recensione). Ho iniziato a giocare a questo gioco 5 anni fa circa (dicembre 2016) ho visto veramente tante cose tra: Nerf, Buff, Adjust, Removed ecc... Per√≤ siamo veramente arrivati ad un punto tale che, non √® pi√π un gioco ma un accozzaglia di errori che, non si sa come, fanno andare avanti il "Gioco" stesso e server che il PeerToPeer forse era meglio... Non vi elencher√≤ tutti i bug "ATTUALMENTE" presenti per 2 semplici motivi:
1) Sono infinitamente troppi;
2) Bug che non sono mai stati risolti e che durano da ANNI.
3) La regola del "No Spoiler" quindi scopriteli voi stessi ^^.

Ad ogni modo, voi tutti vi lamentate che questo gioco √® sbilanciato perch√© il killer "tunnela", "facecampera" o quegli add-on che oneshottano ecc... ma facciamo un piccolo passo indietro:
- Sabotare gli uncini era PERMA (no tempo di ricarica) (anche sulla trappole per orsi)
- Pezzo nuovo -> Insta gen
- Ce la faremo + cura di se -> 2 sec di cura ed eri di nuovo in game!
Eh ma sei main killer vergogna:
- Salva il meglio per la fine + Inarrestabile -> Machine gun 
- Mori -> Insta dead (no hook needed)
- Morsa di ferro + Agitazione -> ti fai tutta la mappa con il survivor in braccio
Per√≤ pensateci bene, si era tutto VERAMENTE sbilanciato per√≤ al contempo era tutto bilanciato, un esempio?
Se potevi sabotare tutti gli uncini (ed erano sabotati perma) con morsa di ferro ed agitazione potevi portarli lo stesso al basement.

Parlando della community, se dicessi tossica e come dire "ragazzi senza acqua si muore" per√≤ non √® giusto fare di tutto l'erba un fascio, quindi dico solo che (basando sulla mia esperienza e sul Rank attuale del gioco):
- Dal rank 20 al 13 sono quasi tutti amichevoli e/o normali;
- Dal 7 al 1 "tossicit√†" sarebbe troppo "normale" e quasi un complimento quindi lo far√≤ con stile: Lasciate ogni speranza o voi che entrate ^^.

Conclusione:
Fin quando non sistemeranno i server ed i bug pi√π cruciali, SCONSIGLIO altamente di comprare questo gioco.

Pretty good so far I'll give it a chance hopefully it doesn't shit on me in the end. I don't wanna play with asians in china because it is literally unplayable but half of the time it connects me don't know why. 300+ ping is dumb but ill give it a fair chance and stick with it for now. 1st match I played got down and the killer guy camped me until someone saved me by ignoring him. People who camp should get severly reduced xp to stop camping because I can see this being an issue. But so far so good I recommend it if you got money to spare because it is fun running away from a crazy guy. But funny this is in America you would think one of these people would have a gun maybe it's in california lol who knows. I would have put one in and made it useless to be a dick but that's just me.
Un buen juego pero que aun le queda por mejorar bastante.

I like it but sind Killers are too unbalanced..

Get this game right now 40 % off from the best  survival game out there what do you need else & most of the bug is fixed & even if u have still some problem just email devs & they will help u asap what else u need just get this game you will never regret if u love horror genres.

This game is fun, not the best but has great game mechanics, worth the money! I absolutely love this game, I recommend this to people who love horror games. After a while this game starts to get old, not gonna lie, but the game is amazing.
I like it. It is fun.
olvidenlo ya me van jajaja buen juego pero odio los campers :/

alright so I was a Day one player for this Roller Coaster of a game and let me just say that every game is scary or you're yelling at the screen for teleporting 20ft to the right after get hit by chainsaw running lunatic. 

If that doesnt sound fun then sorry this isnt the game for you but lets go over the Pros and cons


Pros:

1. this game is really addicting when you first start out because you want to hit rank 1 survivor or killer as fast as you can. that feels so goooooddd when you do

2. there's alot of perks and tools to use in game to help you survive or kill players 

Cons:

1. killers were op for so long that and to add to that the "infinites" were taken away and then games ended really quick because even with the Sprint perk you cant escape by running.

2. THIS GAME IS REALLY BUGGED AND NEEDS SO MANY FIXES HOLY MOLY.

3. obtaining ranks is getting easier and easier for players that you can almost do nothing in a game and wont demote. meaning you have rank 1's who arent good at the teamwork part of this game and just stand around and do nothing.

4. The Devs hated Survivors for months with nerfs. i switched to killer for awhile it got so bad. they bounced back alittle alter but it hurt the experince for some players.


Overall I really enjoyed the time I put into this game and even played a few games with AngryPug when I was a good rank but I no longer play the game since i emailed the support team 3 times with the same problem and never got a reply.

TL;DR Fun addictive game with a lot of Bugs
Really enjoy the concept and the game play but the matchmaking system is not fixed after so long. Overall if this is fixed it is a good game.

This game was so badly done.  ok,, your player moves like they have a baseball bat up there ass from the start, if you get hit you move even slower !!  you have to fix generaters very slowly and have sound play when you have to line up a line as-if you already didnt fix it slow as hell that you needed to be even slower at it !! ... this game was a total waste of money and i wish i would have got a refund for it. Seriously game is fu<king lame and boring as hell.  but ooo dont forget you can jump over window seals and knock over wood pallets ... how exciting can you get !!!!!! its like watching a horror movie you really want to watch ...but you downloaded a sh|tty copy and decided to watch it on a black n white 3 inch screen ... you just want to turn it off after 12 min and delete it till you get a better one.

Dead by Daylight ist ein sehr tolles und interessantes Spiel auch nach 680 Stunden! Das Spiel erh√§lt immer wieder neue gro√üe Updates mit neuen Spielmechaniken! (Besessenheit, Totems, Bloodlust...etc) Es kamen bis jetzt schon 2 kostenlose DLCs raus! (The last breath und Left Behind) diese beiden kostenlosen DLCs beinhalten jeweils 1 neuen Survivor (The last breath einen und Left Behind) und 1 Killer (The last breath=Nurse) Dadurch das es auch √úberlebe mit Freunden gibt kann man einfach mit seinen Freunden gemeinsam gegen einen Fremden Killer √ºberleben! Au√üerdem bietet es seit 1.4 das erweiterte T√∂te deine Freunde wo man alle Perks, Maps, Items und Add ons austesten kann! Nachdem letzten Patch 1.5 gibt es das Status System was die Balance zwischen Killer und Survivor ausmacht! Ich empfehle dieses Spiel sehr und die DLCs sind auch Preisgerecht! Ich freue mich jetzt schon auf die n√§chsten 680 Stunden!

[ EVALUATION D√âPASS√âE ‚ò∫ voir tout en bas ] Si vous souhaitez passer + de temps en recherche de parties et en chargement qu'√† jouer, allez y :) Je publie cette √©valuation √† ma 45√®me heure de jeu.
C'est n'importe quoi j'ai achet√© ce jeu y'a lgtps j'avais arr√™t√© de jouer √† cause des recherches de parties et chargements bugg√©s ( j'ai une config correcte et la fibre pour info ).
Je reviens sur le jeu depuis peu et rien a √©t√© fait pour remedier √† √ßa xDD 
Le jeu devrait s'appeler " Dead by Loading " lol. On se retrouve a attendre au moins 5 minutes pour se retrouver au final back to menu voire pire : freeze puis plantage du jeu ... Donc on retry √† rechercher une partie et zbim rebelotte ! au final on passe + de temps ou autant de temps √† chercher des parties qu'√† jouer.
Deuxi√®me gros point noir : on ne peut pas communiquer in-game avec les random de notre √©quipe :'(

En dehors de ces points noirs ce jeu est SUPER.
Seul Friday the 13th le concurrence ( dans un tout autre d√©lire bien s√ªr ).

Si vous n'avez pas peur de rechercher des parties longtemps, si vous avez un bon livre, un caf√© ou votre t√©l√©phone √† port√©e de main √ßa ira jusqu'√† enfin trouver une partie.

Si on fait abstraction de tous ces bugs de loading / lobby je recommande ce jeu ...

02/06/17 √† 13h23 : Voyez √† quel point le jeu me troll ; j'ai juste attendu 5mn pour trouver un lobby, ensuite la partie se lance, chargement de presque 10 MN  pour au final BACK TO MENU !!! ( le tueur certainement qui en avait marre d'attendre et qui a fait Alt+f4 pour relancer le jeu ... vu que les tueurs sont les h√¥tes ... ).

05/06/17 √† 17h45 je lance une recherche de partie, j'arrive dans le salon " bonjour bonjour, gl hf " etc, puis le chargement bloque √† 3 % alors que l'ic√¥ne de Dead by Daylight continue de tourner comme si ne rien √©tait. Du coup oblig√© de faire alt+f4 pour fermer et relancer le jeu ( ou attendre 427 ans que le jeu back au lobby comme vous voulez ).
 S√©rieux Dead by Loading, on a + peur dans ce jeu de chercher une partie pendant 10 minutes que des tueurs une fois la tchoin de partie lanc√©e.

08/06/17 : ENFIN UNE MISE A JOUR DIGNE DE CE NOM ! TOUS CES BUGS ONT L'AIR D'√äTRE FIX√âS ! ENFIN wiiiiii apr√®s tout ce temps!!!
Du coup n'h√©sitez plus, foncez ... enfin ne vous pr√©cipitez pas non-plus ... car " quelquechose de m√©chant per√ße les ombres de cette affreuse nuit " ...
